techmeme.title: Meta releases pre-trained models that use a novel multi-token prediction approach, available on Hugging Face under a non-commercial research license (Michael Nuñez/VentureBeat)
ElevenLabs will use AI-generated voices of dead actors like Judy Garland and Burt Reynolds in its Reader app, after striking deals with the actors' estates (Samantha Murphy Kelly/CNN)
Sources: in early 2023, a hacker breached OpenAI's internal messaging systems and accessed product details; OpenAI told its staff, but not the public or the FBI (Cade Metz/New York Times)
Evan Blass leaks Samsung's entire spec sheets and marketing materials for the Galaxy Z Fold 6 and Galaxy Z Flip 6, expected at its Unpacked event on July 10 (Sean Hollister/The Verge)
A look at the inaugural Esports World Cup, a multi-genre tournament in Riyadh funded by Saudi Arabia, featuring 1,500+ gamers and a record $60M+ prize pool (Bloomberg)
